message: fix: replace changelog infinite scroll with load more button, restrict future dates
body:
- Replace unreliable infinite scroll in Changelog with manual 'Load More' button
- Add 'Load More' translation keys
- Restrict WorkoutLogger date picker to prevent future date selection (maxDate=today)
author: Jojjeboy

message: feat: complete i18n for settings and exercise list, fix footer icon
body:
- Add i18n support to ExerciseList page (headers, search, filters)
- Add i18n support to Settings page (menu items, dialogs, notifications)
- Fix Footer 'Add' icon size to be consistent with other icons
- Update English and Swedish translation files with all new keys
author: Jojjeboy

message: feat: add i18n support to WorkoutLogger component
body:
- Add useTranslation hook to WorkoutLogger
- Replace table headers (Weight, Reps) with translations
- Replace button labels (Add Set, Log Workout) with translations
- Replace date picker labels (Workout Date, Pick date) with translations
- Replace notification messages with translations
- Add workoutLogger translation keys to both en and sv files
author: Jojjeboy

message: fix: improve changelog lazy load scroll detection
body:
- Use more reliable scroll position calculation (pageYOffset/scrollTop)
- Reduce trigger threshold from 300px to 200px for better detection
- Fix issue where lazy load wasn't triggering at page bottom
author: Jojjeboy

message: feat: add i18n support to ExerciseDetail page
body:
- Add useTranslation hook to ExerciseDetail component
- Replace tab labels (Log, History, Progress) with translations
- Replace table headers (Set, Weight, Reps, Actions) with translations
- Replace modal content (Edit Workout Set, Date, Cancel, Save) with translations
- Replace Instructions title and other UI text with translations
- All exercise detail text now supports English and Swedish
author: Jojjeboy

message: feat: add i18n support and optimize changelog loading
body:
- Add internationalization to DashboardPage and ChangelogPage
- Add comprehensive English and Swedish translations
- Add exercise detail translation keys (ready for implementation)
- Optimize changelog: 20 initial commits, 10 per lazy load batch
- Replace all hardcoded English strings with translation calls
author: Jojjeboy

message: Add success alert and form reset to WorkoutLogger
body:
- Show styled green success alert at top when workout is logged
- Display notification toast with 'Workout Logged' message
- Reset form fields (sets, date) after successful save
- Auto-hide success alert after 3 seconds
- Add optional onSaveSuccess callback for future extension
author: Jojjeboy

message: Add expandable accordion for recent workouts with clickable set completion toggle
body:
- Convert recent workouts list to Mantine Accordion with expandable panels
- Display exercise details (sets, weight, reps) in table format when expanded
- Add clickable status badges to toggle set completion between Done/Pending
- Update set.completed in DB when user clicks the badge
- Persist changes via updateWorkout mutation

message: Add user-friendly update UX: notifications + force-update button
author: Jojjeboy

message:
Add 'Force Update' button to Settings page (triggers SW SKIP_WAITING)

- Add Application section with 'Force Update' button
- Implement handler that triggers SW update and activates waiting worker
- Provide user feedback via alerts when no update or on errors
author: Jojjeboy

message: Add service worker update notification dialog
body:
- Create UpdateNotification component that detects new app versions
- Shows modal dialog when new version is available
- User can choose to update immediately or cancel and be asked again on next load
- Checks for updates every 60 seconds
- Updates vite PWA config with clientsClaim and skipWaiting false for manual control
- Provides smooth update experience with automatic page reload after update
author: Jojjeboy

message: Optimize tab sizing - make each tab take exactly one third width
body:
- Shorten tab labels (Log, History, Progress)
- Reduce font size and padding for better fit
- Add flex: 1 to each tab for equal width distribution
- Tabs now fit cleanly in one row on mobile and desktop
author: Jojjeboy

message: Make exercise detail tabs fit in one row
body:
- Add grow prop to Tabs.List to evenly distribute tabs
- All three tabs (Log Workout, History, Progress) now fit in a single row
author: Jojjeboy

message: Reorganize ExerciseDetail layout - move logging above instructions
body:
- Move workout logging section from right column to top right
- Move instructions section below the main grid for full width
- Better visual flow with logging prominently displayed
- Instructions now span full width at the bottom
author: Jojjeboy

message: Redesign WorkoutLogger for cleaner dark mode appearance
body:
- Replace table-based layout with Paper-based card design
- Each set now displayed in its own Paper container with semi-transparent background
- Improved spacing and alignment with Group components
- Better visual hierarchy with clear header row
- Dark text colors for better contrast
- Cleaner, more modern appearance that works better in both light and dark modes
author: Jojjeboy

message: Fix dark mode visibility in exercise details logger section
body:
- Add explicit white background to WorkoutLogger table container
- Add white backgrounds to NumberInput fields
- Add explicit dark text colors to table headers and row numbers
- Add glass-card class to workout logging Paper container
- Add dark text color to tab labels for better contrast
author: Jojjeboy
